title: The Pharaoh's Greatest Gift
description: 2649BC, a small chest with mysterious markings is urgently hidden from rebels and an elaborate system to conceal its whereabouts is initiated. 1862, an orphanage is burnt to the ground to hide a terrible secret, but Sebastian, the head boy and Sarah, a 12-year-old girl escape with their lives. They stow away on a ship bound for Egypt only to find their troubles have just begun. In a misplaced chest in the ship hold, they discover something that fits the strange twist shaft key that sparks a chain of events more irresistible, alluring and dangerous than ever anticipated. Spaniards, archaeologists, a wealthy British corporation and nomad mercenaries all want what they’ve found and they’ll stop at nothing to get it back… This fast paced novel will have you spellbound until you turn each page seeking to solve the mystery of the cripple soldier in Victorian London, who thrusts a fob chain and twist shaft key into the snow and begs Sebastian ...“take it boy, I’m not who you think I am.”  Clive Johnson is an award winning Author and dedicates this book to all those who want to imagine, wish to believe and long to embrace the mysteries of our past...  Eye of Egypt - The Pharaoh's Greatest Gift [Trilogy Part 1]
author: Clive    Johnson
